name: Get Out
overview: Get Out is a top-down Breakout clone with highly polished graphics. The gameplay is orthodox, with the only addition being the ten power-ups dropped from destroyed bricks, and the usual kinds of "soft" and "hard" bricks, the latter requiring several hits to be destroyed. Certain blocks are even indestructible. The power-ups are: Fast ball, slow ball, bonus points, extra life, smaller bat, bigger bat, double balls, smart bomb and reverse controls.
